duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for staffing, scheduling, and processing payroll for all Security Professionals within assigned client sites.
Interviews, hires, and evaluates employees following company guidelines.
Reviews time-sheets, maintains schedules, and ensures adequate coverage at all times.
Processes requests for pay-related issues and executes distribution of pay.
Conducts disciplinary and counseling sessions with Security Professionals in a proactive and professional manner.
Maintains a well-organized, effective working area, and ensures all deadlines are consistently met.
Performs additional projects or tasks as directed by managers.

education_certification.credential: Minimum high school diploma or equivalent required. Prior security industry and/or military experience preferred. College degree or coursework desirable.
